Civil rights icon and Georgia Congressman John Lewis said Monday he would not support President Obama 's controversial choice for district judge in his state .
Boggs ' selection has been openly criticized by progressives , given his stance on gay marriage , abortion and other civil rights issues .
The Congressional Black Caucus opposes his confirmation , as does Senate majority leader Harry Reid .
Home - state Senators typically offer their opinions on judicial nominees , and the two Republican Senators from Georgia support Boggs ' nomination .
